description: This file implements the main logic and UI components for a Tic Tac Toe game using the Qwik framework. It includes game state management, rendering logic, winner calculation, and UI layout for the game board, header, and footer.

methods.name: renderPiece
methods.description: Returns an emoji span representing 'X' as a knight or 'O' as a queen for rendering in the game board.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Determines the winner of the Tic Tac Toe game by analyzing the current board state.
